freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign drug_id>${row["Drug"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign publication_id>${row["PublicationID"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign gene>${row["Gene"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign substitutions>${row["Substitutions"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign study_type>${row["StudyType"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign clade_id>${row["Clade"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign resistance_level>${row["ResistanceLevel"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign fold_change>${row["FoldChange"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign svr>${row["SVR"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign id>${drug_id}_${publication_id}_${gene}_${substitutions}_${study_type}_${clade_id}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug_resistance_finding "${id}" create custom-table-row --allowExisting drug_resistance_clade "${clade_id}" custom-table-row drug_resistance_finding "${id}" set link-target drug "custom-table-row/drug/${drug_id}" set link-target drug_resistance_publication "custom-table-row/drug_resistance_publication/${publication_id}" set link-target drug_resistance_clade "custom-table-row/drug_resistance_clade/${clade_id}" set link-target variation "reference/H77_AF009606/feature-location/${gene}/variation/RAS_${gene}_${substitutions}" set field study_type "${study_type}" set field resistance_level "${resistance_level}" <#if study_type == "in_vitro" && fold_change != ""> set field fold_change "${fold_change}" </#if> <#if study_type == "clinical" && svr != ""> set field svr "${svr}" </#if> exit </#list>
